00129 typedef enum
00130 {
00131   APS_TRANSPORT_KEY_SUCCESS_STATUS = 0x00,
00132   APS_TRANSPORT_KEY_NO_SHORT_ADDRESS_STATUS = 0x01,
00133   APS_TRANSPORT_KEY_SECURITY_FAIL_STATUS = 0x02,
00134   APS_TRANSPORT_KEY_NOT_SENT_STATUS = 0x03,
00135   APS_TRANSPORT_KEY_INVALID_PARAMETER_STATUS = 0x04,
00136   /* These names are deprecated and will be removed. */

00138   APS_TKR_NO_SHORT_ADDRESS_STATUS = APS_TRANSPORT_KEY_NO_SHORT_ADDRESS_STATUS,
